=================
EEA Async Manager
=================

Manage plone.app.async (zc.async) queue

.. contents::


Installation
============

* Go to admin > Site Setup > Add-ons
* Activate EEA Async Manager

Getting started
===============

1. Go to *Plone > Site Setup > Async Queue Manager*

Authors
=======

  EEA_ - European Environment Agency (EU)

.. _EEA: https://www.eea.europa.eu/
